input_output_options.title: Input/output options
input_output_options.description: Define where the pipeline should find input data and save output data.

reads.description: The .fastq.gz files which will be aligned to the targets FASTA file.

targets.description: The FASTA file containing the DNA sequences used for bait-capture sequencing.

outdir.description: The output directory where the results will be saved. You have to use absolute paths to storage on Cloud infrastructure.

host.description: A FASTA file of a host reference genome to use for host read decontamination.

trimmomatic.description: Command-line arguments for custom Trimmomatic parameters.
